statements: SELECT * FROM RegulatoryComplianceDocuments WHERE document_type = 'Policy'
SELECT document_name, submission_date FROM RegulatoryComplianceDocuments WHERE submission_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT docume‌nt_name, document_type FROM RegulatoryComplianceDocuments ORDER BY document_type ASC
SELECT document_id, document_name FROM RegulatoryComplianceDocuments WHERE document_type = 'Procedure' ORDER BY last_updated DESC
SELECT document_id, document_name, submission_date, last_updated FROM RegulatoryComplianceDocuments
SELECT document_id, document_name, submission_date FROM RegulatoryComplianceDocuments;
SELECT document_id, document_type, submission_date, last_updated FROM RegulatoryComplianceDocuments WHERE document_type='Policy';
SELECT document_id, document_name, submission_date FROM RegulatoryComplianceDocuments WHERE submission_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM RegulatoryComplianceDocuments ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT document_id, document_name, submission_date FROM RegulatoryComplianceDocuments WHERE document_type='Procedure' ORDER BY submission_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_bodies;
SELECT body_name, location FROM regulatory_bodies WHERE id = 1;
SELECT document_name, document_date FROM compliance_documents WHERE body_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM compliance_documents WHERE document_type = 'Policy';
SELECT doc_id, document_name FROM compliance_documents ORDER BY document_date DESC;
SELECT body_name, location FROM regulatory_bodies;
SELECT * FROM compliance_documents WHERE doc_id = 1;
SELECT doc_id, document_name, document_date FROM compliance_documents WHERE document_type = 'Policy';
SELECT body_name, location, document_name FROM regulatory_bodies JOIN compliance_documents ON regulatory_bodies.id = compliance_documents.body_id;

SELECT body_name AS regulatory_body, COUNT(doc_id) AS total_documents FROM regulatory_bodies LEFT JOIN compliance_documents ON regulatory_bodies.id = compliance_documents.body_id GROUP BY regulatory_body;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_bodies_documents;
SELECT document_name, document_type FROM regulatory_bodies_documents WHERE regulatory_body_id = 1;
SELECT regulatory_body_name, regulatory_body_location FROM regulatory_bodies ORDER BY regulatory_body_name DESC;
SELECT check_name, check_date FROM compliance_checks WHERE regulatory_body_id = 2 ORDER BY check_date ASC;
SELECT check_name, check_description FROM compliance_checks WHERE check_description LIKE '%important%'
SELECT * FROM regulatory_bodies_documents;
SELECT document_name, document_type FROM regulatory_bodies_documents WHERE regulatory_body_id = 2;
SELECT regulatory_body_name, regulatory_body_type FROM regulatory_bodies ORDER BY regulatory_body_name DESC;
SELECT check_name, check_description, check_date FROM compliance_checks WHERE regulatory_body_id = 1 ORDER BY check_date ASC;

SELECT document_name, document_type, regulatory_body_name FROM regulatory_bodies_documents JOIN regulatory_bodies ON regulatory_bodies_documents.regulatory_body_id = regulatory_bodies.regulatory_body_id;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_bodies;
SELECT body_name, location FROM regulatory_bodies;
SELECT * FROM compliance_documents WHERE body_id = 1;
SELECT document_name, document_type, upload_date FROM compliance_documents WHERE body_id = 2;
SELECT audit_date, body_id FROM audits ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_bodies;
SELECT body_name, location FROM regulatory_bodies WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT document_name, document_type FROM compliance_documents WHERE document_type = 'Policy';
SELECT r.body_name, d.document_name FROM regulatory_bodies r JOIN compliance_documents d ON r.id = d.body_id;
SELECT d.document_name, dc.content FROM compliance_documents d JOIN document_contents dc ON d.id = dc.document_id;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_bodies;
SELECT name, location FROM regulatory_bodies;
SELECT * FROM compliance_documents WHERE doc_type = 'Policy';
SELECT audit_date, compliance_status FROM audit_records ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT auditors.name, auditor_assignments.assignment_id FROM auditors JOIN auditor_assignments ON auditors.auditor_id = auditor_assignments.auditor_id;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_bodies WHERE name = 'FDA';
SELECT compliance_status, audit_date FROM audit_records ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT auditors.name, auditor_assignments.assignment_id FROM auditors JOIN auditor_assignments ON auditors.auditor_id = auditor_assignments.auditor_id WHERE auditors.certification_status = TRUE;

SELECT compliance_documents.body, regulatory_bodies.location FROM compliance_documents JOIN regulatory_bodies ON compliance_documents.regulatory_body_id = regulatory_bodies.id WHERE compliance_documents.doc_type = 'Policy';
SELECT * FROM auditor_assignments WHERE audit_record_id IN (SELECT record_id FROM audit_records WHERE compliance_status = FALSE);
